post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
작성자   : 김승엽

Hi Richard,

First of all, congratulations on your graduation from the University of Waterloo!
Unfortunately, I am NOT a person you are looking for but can give you a person's phone number who has been working as an Oracle DBA for Bank of Montreal.

His name is Dave Park and you may contact him by using 416-773-2810 or 416-363-9404 which is his private business phone number. His wife will pick up the phone.

Good Luck!

Sheon


Richard Yoon wrote:

> Hello everybody,
>
> I am a recent graduate from the University of Waterloo majoring in Mathematics and minoring in Computer Science.  Right now, my experience lies in software development and testing but I wish to pursue a career as a Oracle DBA.  I have looked into various programs available, but am unsure as to the best approach for such an area.
>
> Could anyone provide any advice into this matter?
post.title: [2001/08/25] Looking for advice
